tests.title: ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an invalid email address format
tests.fullTitle: GGMS - SIGN IN TEST SUITE ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an invalid email address format
tests.code:
signInPage.login(userData.invalidEmailAddress, userData.password);
signInPage.getErrorMessage().should("have.text", " Email must be an email");

tests.title: ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an incorrect password
tests.fullTitle: GGMS - SIGN IN TEST SUITE ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an incorrect password
tests.code:
signInPage.login(userData.emailAddress, userData.incorrectPassword);
signInPage.getErrorMessage().should("have.text", " Incorrect email or password. Please try again.");

tests.title: ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an incorrect email address
tests.fullTitle: GGMS - SIGN IN TEST SUITE ❌ User should not be allowed to login with an incorrect email address
tests.code:
signInPage.login(userData.incorrectEmailAddress, userData.password);
signInPage.getErrorMessage().should("have.text", " Incorrect email or password. Please try again.");
